Text: Re The Enron Legal Department Conference Cc Jamespst Jim Forgive my delayed response but I too will look forward to cochairing next years legal conference with David and to following in the impressive footprints of Michelle Cash and the committee Best regards Michelle David Koogler PM To James NRON cc Kristina MordauntEnron nron Communications Michelle NRON Michelle HicksEnron nron Communications Subject Re The Enron Legal Department Conference Jim I am looking forward to working with Michelle to CoChair the event We appreciate your confidence in us and are honored to be the CoChairs Michelle Cash and her team did set a high standard and also put in place the ground work to help ensure successful events for the future I know Michelle Cash has a notebook of information that she would like to pass on to the next Chairs We will schedule a meeting with Michelle Cash shortly Regards David James nronXgate PM To Michelle HicksEnron nron Communications David KooglerEnron nron Communications cc Michelle CT Kristina MordauntEnron nron Communications Subject The Enron Legal Department Conference Michelle and David I would very much appreciate your serving as CoChairs of the Enron Legal Department Conference which will be held at a Westin resort in the Dallas area Michelle Cash and her team of which the two of you were important members have set an extremely high standard but I know that you will do a superb job Please let me know when you would like me to ask the various groups to select the members of your team Thank you Jim Embedded StdOleLink
Out of Office AutoReply Floor Meeting December Please send all personal emails to Thank you meh

REMINDER Happy Hour on Friday November UNOFFICIAL EBS LEGAL DEPARTMENT HAPPY HOUR Please come by if you can Friday November pm Vassar St Take Allen Parkway or West Dallas from downtown to Montrose and go leftsouth on Montrose Turn right on Richmond and go west until the traffic light at Mandell Turn left on Mandell go over the overpass over US to the four way stop at Vassar Turn right at the stop sign onto Vassar My house is the third house on the left From US exit ShepherdGreenbriar and go north on Shepherd take a right on Richmond go east on Richmond until the light at Dunlavy Take a right on Dunlavy go over the overpass over US to the four way stop at Vassar Turn left at the stop sign onto Vassar My house is on the right towards the end of the block My block of Vassar is between Mandell and Dunlavy and my home number is See you there

FW PSA GSAfyi Original Message From Merten Eric Sent Tuesday September PM To Hicks Michelle Cc Garner Joanne Subject PSA GSA Michelle Attached are my form documents for the Professional Service Agreement and the General Service Agreement I really apperical your help on this stuff and can not thank you enough You can get me on my cell phone the rest of the week if you have any questions Eric

RE For your amusementDoesnt sound too bad Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Thursday November AM To Hicks Michelle Subject RE For your amusement Me too My little boy watches it all the time Maybe we can watch it together Original Message From Hicks Michelle Sent Thursday November AM To Mann Kay Subject RE For your amusement I like that he watched Sponge Bob Square Pants Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Thursday November AM To Hicks Michelle Subject RE For your amusement Has to be on the top of the list of funny stuff Original Message From Hicks Michelle Sent Thursday November AM To Mann Kay Subject For your amusement Original Message From Swann Stacy Sent Monday November PM To Duenner Anthony Cohagan Fred Clark Craig Heng ChoonBoon Roumel Jonathan Todd Chuck Sarma P D Babu Sobhan Leahy Patrick Dragon Appolina Nunas Maurice Hicks Michelle Hagerty Lauren Masani Zal Fernandes Beaven Callaway Jan Subject FW so youve been laid off Original Message From stacy swann mailto Sent Tuesday November AM To Swann Stacy Subject Fwd so youve been laid off Note forwarded message attached Do You Yahoo Yahoo GeoCities quick and easy web site hosting just month psinfo

RE Litigation Threat Cc Caroline My comments are attached for your consideration Thank you Michelle My fax number is I will look forward to receiving copies of the documents you mentioned Thanks Original Message From Schaeffer Caroline Sent Thursday November AM To Duenner Anthony Cc McBride Jane Hicks Michelle Trieschman Paul Goh Chor Lim Subject Litigation Threat Anthony I am going to send you via fax a letter we received from Jim Weisser yesterday Attached is our response Basically he was upset that we hadnt responded yet to his letter of last week Please let me know if you are ok with this letter and we will send over a final copy via fax for your signature Michelle I will send a copy your way as well in addition to yesterdays letter our response to the first letter and the legal advice we received from Freshfields Pls let me know if you have any questions Thanks Caroline File Letter to Jim Weisserdoc

FW LitigationMichelle and Andy I will send you a copy when I receive it Please let me know if anyone else should be notified Thank you Michelle Original Message From Schaeffer Caroline Sent Sun PM To Hirl Joseph Duenner Anthony Hicks Michelle Cc Trieschman Paul Goh Chor Lim McBride Jane Subject Litigation I have just received a fax sent to Joe copied to me from Jim Weisser stating that he will be filing suit against Enron Japan Corp for wrongful termination A copy of the fax is on its way to Michelle and Anthony Joe I expect youll be receiving the original in the mail today

Re Regulatory meetingForwarded by Michelle HicksEnron Communications on PM JoAnne Garner PM To Michelle HicksEnron nron Communications cc Melissa LoydContractorEnron nron Communications Subject Re Regulatory meeting I have reserved A for you guys tomorrow from Thanks Joanne Garner

Re Regulatory meetingSee you tomorrow We have conference room EB A at noon Thanks Michelle Jeff NRON Sent by Jeff NRON PM To Michelle HicksEnron NRON COMMUNICATIONS cc Subject Re Regulatory meeting it is ill need to leave at pm to catch my plane we should be able to get things done in an hour Best Jeff Michelle NRON COMMUNICATIONS PM To Robbi RossiEnron nron Communications Jeff nron cc Subject Re Regulatory meeting Forwarded by Michelle HicksEnron Communications on PM JoAnne Garner PM To Michelle HicksEnron nron Communications cc Melissa LoydContractorEnron nron Communications Subject Re Regulatory meeting I have reserved A for you guys tomorrow from Thanks Joanne Garner

Re Company Name to Use for our Singapore License Cc In Hong Kong and Japan we set up local entities and used those entities to apply for the various licenses in those jurisdictions I assumed we would do the same in Singapore However I think our discussions over the past two weeks have raised questions about which entities will be used for bandwidth trading in Asia There now appears to be a question about using one trading entity wherever it may be domiciled and getting that company licensed in each jurisdiction I dont think this issue has been resolved I will defer to the group and perhaps we can discuss this on Wednesday as to whether we should continue our course of action and use the Singapore entity to apply for the SBO license while we continue to discuss the overall strategy Thank you Michelle David NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To Robbi ES cc Michelle nron Communications Wayne GardnerEnron nron Communications ENRON COMMUNICATIONS Subject Company Name to Use for our Singapore License Robbi Michelle This is to get guidance on whether I can use our newly established Singapore Company below in the application for our Singapore SBO license The license form requires me to name our company its Singapore Business Registration Number its principal activities as registered in the registry of companies its address its corporate structure its financial information a contact person namedesignation a contact number etc So normally I would reason to use this new company for this application Yet in one of our conference calls someone said if I understood that this company was only for holding title to equipment not for all of the bandwidth trading capacity providing and content activities described in the company purposes I suppose this distinction is for a tax purpose Be that as it may I am faced with this form Can I use this company below in the application If not then what company and what are all of its characteristics as listed in para one above To think ahead a bit we will also need a company name for our Pioneer Tax status application For sure that will have to be a Singapore Based company since the whole rationale for Pioneer Status revolves around locating in Singapore So maybe we should be using the same name for both applications Further if we did get Pioneer Tax status most favorable rate is zero tax for five years though we may or may not get that wouldnt all of our standard tax avoidance strategies need to be relooked at in the light that they possibly may not be as needed in this case Please provide me guidance Many thanks PS I will be in Houston the week of Nov if needed for discussions but earlier guidance appreciated David Forwarded by David MerrillENRONDEVELOPMENT on PM Ang Partners on AM Please respond to Ang Partners To cc Subject Enron Broadband Services Singapore Pte Ltd the Company CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE This email from ANG PARTNERS including any attachment to it is confidential and may also be privileged and exempt from disclosure under applicable law Accordingly if you are not the intended recipient please notify us immediately delete this email including any attachment to it from your computer system and do not disclose or distribute it to any other person or continue to read this email Thank you Dear Mr Merrill I refer to our telephone conversation this afternoon and as requested I attach herewith a copy of the Certificate of Incorportion of the Company and the main object clauses of the Company for your attention Regards Preetha Pillai ANG PARTNERS Encls ObjectsMApdf Certificatepdf
